Rule.name: Objects Owned by the Requestor
Rule.Description: This rule returns a Filter that restricts objects to those that the requestor or one of their workgroups owns

Argument.name: log
Argument.Description: The log object associated with the SailPointContext.

Argument.name: context
Argument.Description: A sailpoint.api.SailPointContext object that can be used to query the database if necessary.

Argument.name: requestor
Argument.Description: Identity that is making the Life Cycle Manager request.

Argument.name: requestee
Argument.Description: Identity on whose behalf the Life Cycle Manager request is being made. In the case of bulk requests, this argument will be set to null when determining the objects that are visible to the requestor. It will be provided once a selection has been made in order to determine whether or not the given requestee should have access to the selected object.

Argument.name: filter
Argument.Description: A Filter object that will be used to search for accessible Objects.
